entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve the image generation for specific use cases #11099
    Backlog
  • Entry height rendering is broken #11098
  • Checklist for win-arm64 support #11090
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • FilePicker on MacOS does not always return the file picked #11088
  • Setter Specificity #11082
    Backlog
  • Grid columns inside FlexLayout do not adjust their size correctly on Android #11079
  • Allow Android archiving for both Apk and Aab formats #11077
  • The bug WMC100 #11076

Closed

  • .PNG Tab Icons on iOS aren't scaled properly #8609
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Importing a JS module into a .NET MAUI Blazor app fails #11062
  • Splashscreen not showing in Windows #7602
  • Windows: Package name is not replaced in package.appmanifest (maui-package-name-placeholder) #8670
  • MauiImage resource not work with TintColor #8527
  • The name 'Resources' is reserved and cannot be used. #10531
  • The name Resources is reserved and cannot be used #10975
  • [Windows 11 Insider] Image appears distorted. #9464
    Backlog
  • SkiaSharp (or LiveCharts) causes crash in release mode #11069
  • Win32 exception on startup when using dependency injection with ContentPage #11038
  • Strange entries in the .csproj #11043
  • Issue 7015 has not been fixed, please reopen this issue #11063
    Backlog
  • Share dialog not working as expected in BlazorWebView in Windows Forms, WPF and .NET MAUI #2413
    Backlog
  • Update Blazor Desktop to use new Static Web Assets metadata #1759
    Backlog
  • Attached methods of layouts should take IView parameter instead of BindableObject #10988
  • Support mobile style navigation in .NET MAUI Blazor apps #3789
    Backlog
  • RootComponentCollectionExtensions.cs is included in WinForms but missing in Wpf. #4057
    Backlog
  • Handles CoreWebView2.ProcessFailed in BlazorWebView #6481
    Backlog
  • (Blazor Hybrid) CSS Min Map files do not load #7194
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] Update templates to include a message in the app when the browser version is too old #8307
    Backlog
  • Clarification required: On screen keyboard #5272 #10922
  • CollectionView: RemainingItemsThreshold not working properly #11037
    Backlog
  • iOS build does not respect link flags like <AdditionalArgs>-gcc_flags "-framework CoreMIDI"</AdditionalArgs> #8468
  • MSAL auth - Android - Release - crash after splashscreen #11067
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain version 6.0.11... is not found in NuGet feeds" #10952
  • Opening Mac app storyboard in Xcode doesn't open as a project #10997

PullRequests

Created

  • Add basic Android automated accessiblity testing #11097
  • Revert "[android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default" #11096
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Bump provisionator task to version 2 #11092
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Provisionator fixes net6 branch #11085
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

Merged

  • [foldable] XML doc additions #10972
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Bump provisionator task to version 2 #11095
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add backport to branch #11094
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22551.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22553.1 #11080
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [foldable] XML doc additions (#10972) #11091
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11027
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Provisionator fixes net7 branch #11081
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Continue if provisionator fails #11068
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Cherry pick net7 #11056
  • Enable Codeql #10889
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • fix issue 9255 (Wrong Date format DatePicker Windows) #11073
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (not before) #9678
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [Android] Fix crash using Page IsBusy property #9783
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Align Shapes Fill property behavior with Xamarin.Forms #10328
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Improve CollectionView scrolling (Shadows) #10523
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix Stepper IsEnabled property changes #11053
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-stepper
  • [Windows] Fix Entry placeholder position using VerticalTextAlignment #8684
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 Planning
  • [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #10522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [iOS] Fix issue loading local files in WebView #10804
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, control-frame, .NET 7 Planning
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
